title: RFETrack push RFE to bugtrack doesnt work
description:
I want to push RFE 2124 (http://rfetrack.marklogic.com/detail/2124) to bugtrack.
I bring up the RFE in RFETrack, I click "push to bugtrack", I get the conformation screen, and when I push "confirm and create" I get an error (below).
The bug number increments (i.e. every time I do this it tries to push to a new bug) but the entry doesnt appear in bugtrack.

changeHistory.comment:
Hi Stephen,

I can't see the error you're getting in the BugTrack description.  Could you check and re-post if necessary?

Regards,

J.

<error:error xsi:schemaLocation="http://marklogic.com/xdmp/error error.xsd" xmlns:error="http://marklogic.com/xdmp/error" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <error:code>XDMP-RANGEINDEX</error:code>
  <error:name/>
  <error:xquery-version>1.0-ml</error:xquery-version>
  <error:message>Range index error</error:message>
  <error:format-string>XDMP-RANGEINDEX: Range index error: dateTime fn:doc("root/support/bugtracking/bug20680.xml")/bt:bug-holder/bt:bug/bt:comment-log/bt:comment[3]/bt:timestamp: XDMP-CAST: (err:FORG0001) Invalid cast: xs:untypedAtomic("") cast as xs:dateTime</error:format-string>
  <error:retryable>false</error:retryable>
  <error:expr/>
  <error:data>
    <error:datum>dateTime</error:datum>
    <error:datum>fn:doc("root/support/bugtracking/bug20680.xml")/bt:bug-holder/bt:bug/bt:comment-log/bt:comment[3]/bt:timestamp</error:datum>
    <error:datum>XDMP-CAST</error:datum>
    <error:datum>xs:untypedAtomic("")</error:datum>
    <error:datum>xs:dateTime</error:datum>
  </error:data>
  <error:stack>
    <error:frame>
      <error:uri>/detail/push-to-bugtrack.xqy</error:uri>
      <error:xquery-version>1.0-ml</error:xquery-version>
    </error:frame>
  </error:stack>
</error:error>
I fixed this particular one via the data as I recall - however it has now come up again - see bug 25255 for progress
